{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf949\cocoasubrtf460 {\fonttbl\f0\fnil\fcharset0 LucidaGrande;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;} \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural
\f0\fs26 \cf0 This package will install Fluke 0.2 on your computer.\ \ Fluke comes with a few libraries so don't be surprised when the installer asks for your username and password.\ \ Also, if you have iTunes or QuickTime running, it's probably a good idea to close them now, though if you don't restart them after you install Fluke.\ \ Cheerio, and happy FLACking!}
